name: Asian Crack Sauce Recipe
description: Looking for a new steak sauce? Try this amazing umami-packed Asian sauce. It’s a sweet and spicy sauce made from a combination of fish sauce, sugar, lime juice, shallots, garlic, cilantro, and chili peppers. It’s so good on just about everything and so addicting that we simply call it the Asian crack sauce.
keywords: fish sauce, dipping sauce, steak sauce recipe, asian steak recipe, asian steak sauce, thai-style steak sauce, thai crack sacue, asian crack sauce recipe

video.name: Steak with Asian Crack Sauce Recipe
video.description: Looking for a new steak sauce? Try this amazing umami-packed Asian sauce. It’s a sweet and spicy sauce made from a combination of fish sauce, sugar, lime juice, shallots, garlic, cilantro, and chili peppers. It’s so good on just about everything and so addicting that we simply call it the Asian crack sauce.

recipeIngredient: 1 or 2 red Thai chili peppers (slice thinly)
recipeInstructions: Combine fish sauce, lime juice, Thai chili peppers, shallots, garlic, cilantro, and brown sugar in a small bowl. Mix until combined. Serve with steak, seafood, chicken, and many more.
